title: Early Creative Experiments
description: Foundational period of creative exploration spanning film production, gaming content creation, music production, and design work across multiple industries, building broad skillset and understanding of creative excellence principles.

metrics: Worked as PA and stunt performer on 'Zombie Hunter' starring Danny Trejo
Built 2,000-follower streaming presence as Pro Dota 2 player 'ZoidTV'

impact: Established foundational understanding of creative industries and excellence principles, building broad skillset that would inform future professional specialization and strategic career decisions toward meaningful impact creation
